body.p:
Greenupsburg, Ky,
July 16 1861
Hon B. Magoffin
Sir,

John S. Hunt, a very worthy clever citizen of this County, was fined by the Circuit Court, at its present term, the sum of $100, for making a little bet upon the late presidential election with a citizen of the state of Ohio, Mr Hunt is a gentleman of great good character, not disposed knowingly to violate the laws, and wishes to throw himself upon your mercy for this offense unwittingly committed, and asks the remission of the fine, I cheerfully unite with him in asking that, the fine be remitted,
P S. All that Col. Stanton has written above is strictly True and I Surely That your Excellency will remit the fine. & Send remission to Ed F Dulin Esq Greenupsburg Ky

Greenup Cir Ct
$100. } Gaming
Jno. S. Hurt
